name: @mailbots/mailbots-sdk
description: JS SDK for access to MailBots APIs – node.js and browser

scripts.test:
echo '

⚠️ Some tests skipped. To tests everything, configure test mailbots, test:live and set NOCK_OFF=true 
process.NOCK_OFF is not set 

'; SERVER=true mocha --require babel-register --require babel-polyfill
scripts.test:live:
echo '
To test against live api, set NOCK_OFF=true

'; SERVER=true mocha -t 5000 --require babel-register --require babel-polyfill --inspect-brk
scripts.build: npm run build:node && npm run build:browser && npm run build:dist
scripts.build:node: rimraf lib-node && SERVER=true babel --out-dir lib-node src
scripts.build:browser: rimraf lib-browser && SERVER=false babel --out-dir lib-browser src
scripts.build:docs:
documentation -c documentation.yml -f html build src/* -o docs && cd docs && now --static && echo '
 Run: 

 now alias mailbots-sdk-js.mailbots.com
'
scripts.publish: git push && git push --tags && npm publish

author: Reilly Sweetland @rsweetland
